mapper.select: SELECT restaurant_id AS restaurantID, business_id AS businessId, business_tel AS tel, business_name AS name, business_number AS number FROM business_user WHERE business_id = #{businessId}

SELECT r.reservation_id AS resvId, d.title AS storeName, r.reservation_date AS resvDate, r.reservation_time AS resvTime, r.count_people AS headCount, r.reservation_state AS status FROM reservation r JOIN restaurant_detail d ON r.restaurant_id = d.restaurant_id WHERE r.restaurant_id = #{restaurant_id} ORDER BY r.reservation_date DESC
